description:
Hi guys 

I am using OpenStack with  FlatDHCP network..   

Trying to create a new network via nova-manage network  command I noticed the --vlanid option.


  Which is the meaning of this parameter for my config ? 

 Does it make sense   using VLAN Manager network manager only? 

 Is this an input validation bug or Am I wrong ?  Thx
title: VLAN argument on nova-manage create network

comments.content:
Hi guys 

I am using OpenStack with  FlatDHCP network..   

Trying to create a new network via nova-manage network  command I noticed the --vlanid option.

comments.content: Converting this bug into a question
